data.title: The Mambo Kings Play Songs of Love (Signed) by HIJUELOS, Oscar: (1989) Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Soft cover - Farrar Straus and Giroux, New York - 1989 - First edition. Softcover. Advanced Reading Copy. Hijuelos' Pulitzer Prize winning second novel. Basis for very good movie with Armand Assante, and Antonio Banderas. A close to near fine copy in illustrated wrappers. Signed by Hijuelos on the title page. - The Mambo Kings Play Songs of Love (Signed)
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

Books are subject to prior sale.

Libraries, institutions, and accredited dealers in the United States can be sent books with invoice.

All books noted as First Editions are also First Printings unless indicated otherwise. Books are returnable for any reason within 30 days of the estimated delivery date provided they are returned in the same condition they were sent. Illinois residents please add 7.00% sales tax.

Jeff Hirsch Books

39850 N Dilleys Rd

Wadsworth, IL 60083

847-662-2665

mail@jhbooks.co...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 3 LB, or 1.4 KG. However, larger or heavier books or multi-volume sets will require additional postage. We will contact you if additional postage is required.

We ship all books in sturdy boxes or in stiff cardboard mailers.

International customers: We are now using UPS for most international shipments. Please let us know if you can not take UPS at your location

for UK addresses:

abebooks collects VAT for all orders with a customs value below £135. For orders above £135, you will be responsible for any tax or customs charges. If you have a VAT number, please email us the number so that we can add it to your shipping paperwork.

for Euro Zone addresses:

abebooks collects VAT for all orders with a customs value below €150. For orders above €150, you will be responsible for any tax or customs charges. If you have a VAT number, please email us the number so that we can add it to your shipping paperwork.

for other countries: abebooks collects taxes for order going to Australia, Canada, New Zealand, Norway as required by each country. For other areas, you will be responsible for all customs or tax charges for importation. We do not pay this charges. If you have a tax number for your country, please email it to us as this will expedite your package through customs.
